Judul: STUDY OF CALCIUM PHOSPHATE BIOCERAMICS POWDERS SYNTHESIZED VIA BIOMIMETIC PROCESS
Abstrak: In this study, calcium phosphate bioceramics powders were synthesized using Ca(NO3)2.4H2O and (NH4)2HPO4 as the precursor by a biomimetic process. The condition of the synthesizing process is set mimicking the human physiological environment. The synthesized samples then were dried and calcined at several temperatures. The samples were studied after characterized by XRD, FT-IR, EDS and SEM. The process in this study was successful in synthesizing various types of calcium phosphate bioceramics.
Kata Kunci: Biokeramik kalsium fosfat, Proses biomimetic, Karakterisasi material
